name: Zachery Bilger
text: Pizza was phenomenal. Marcos is my favorite and I have used locations all over Indy. The pizza was definitely on par with the high quality I've come to expect. The one less star is due to the restaurant being completely empty and still ‚Ä¶More

name: Ileen weiner
text: Probably some of the best pizza on the north side of Indianapolis. You can select the amount of cheese & sauce. You can select the type of crust and different fresh ingredients from their menu! I would definitely recommend Marco's Pizza!

name: Dave Handler
text: Myself being from NY I've never really been big on chain pizzeria places.  I have to admin that Marco's isn't to bad!  I've never had a bad experience at this location and if they did make a mistake the staff worked hard to make it right!  Guess that's why I've been coming back over and over again for the past 10 years!

name: Larry Johnson
text: I've been getting pizza here for years..an it keeps getting better this place knows the definition of customer service.

name: Samantha West
text: Super fast delivery and my pizza was hot & tasty. Ordering from Marco's from now on.

name: Jared Baird
text: Best pizza chain around. Think fresh, quality, delicious. Mangiamo! There's a reason they've been the fasting growing pizza franchise for like a decade. Dough made fresh by hand every day in every store, rests over night served the next ‚Ä¶More

name: Team Zuhlke
text: Took a few attempts to get connected to someone who then was not able to complete our order.  The guy on the phone kept saying "You're going to have to slow down"  We went through my phone number one slow digit at a time.  In the end, he couldn't get the promo code to work and was pretty rude about it.  No Marcos for us tonight.

name: William Goins
text: I was told it would be 60 minutes til my delivery. After giving them an extra 15 minutes, I called, waited on hold for 6 minutes, and was then told that the delivery driver pretty much delivers when he feels like it. After waiting an additional 20 minutes, I had to refund my order. I never did see that pizza

name: Amanda Reed
text: Marcos is a decent chain.  Their pizza is good but not great.  We live near one, so we get their food almost out of necessity rather than being exactly what we want.  Sandwiches are pretty good.  They're better than subway by a long shot, ‚Ä¶More
